title: How do I back up and restore contacts?
answer: Backup [On the home screen, touch Tools > Backup. ]()Select Contacts, touch the menu button, and touch Backup. If your phone has an external microSD card, the backup data is stored in the HuaweiBackup folder in the root directory of the microSD card. If your phone does not have an external microSD card, the backup data is stored in the HuaweiBackup folder in the root directory of your phone's internal storage. Restoration On the home screen, touch Tools > Backup > Restore from SD card > Contacts > RESTORE. You can choose to overwrite contacts or not. [Make sure you have backed up contacts before you restore them.]()
